body_html: So I guess the problem is that there's no way to stop a thread from Python if a thread is stuck inside of a session.run call. One work-around is to create session with config.operation_timeout_in_ms as above
body_text: So I guess the problem is that there's no way to stop a thread from Python if a thread is stuck inside of a session.run call. One work-around is to create session with config.operation_timeout_in_ms as above
body: So I guess the problem is that there's no way to stop a thread from Python if a thread is stuck inside of a `session.run` call. One work-around is to create session with `config.operation_timeout_in_ms` as above
